projectName: MIA System PRD - AI Agent Governance Document
description: Tasks derived from structured PRD requirements

tasks.title: Implement file classification system
tasks.description: Classify each file as CORE|SUPPORTING|CANDIDATE|BLOCKED based on entry points, test coverage, and whitepaper mentions. Must satisfy: exclusive classification, evidence-based, default to BLOCKED on uncertainty.
acceptanceCriteria: Each file assigned exactly one classification
Files referenced by entry point → CORE

tasks.title: Build evidence collection system
tasks.description: Collect evidence from AST imports, coverage.json, whitepaper references. Each evidence must include source and confidence (0.0–1.0).

tasks.title: Construct dependency graph
tasks.description: Build directed dependency graph from Python imports. Detect entry points, circular dependencies, and ensure bidirectional consistency (A imports B ⇔ B.imported_by contains A).

tasks.title: Generate YAML audit report
tasks.description: Output valid YAML report with metadata, summary stats, per-file classification, deletion_impact for CANDIDATE, blocked_reason for BLOCKED.

tasks.title: Implement human approval queue
tasks.description: Add all CANDIDATE and BLOCKED files to Human_Approval_Queue. Maintain immutable audit trail of all decisions.

tasks.title: Enforce read-only safety mechanism
tasks.description: Audit tool must never delete or modify source code. Enforce: no file.delete(), source unchanged after run, protected patterns preserved.

tasks.title: Export validated files
tasks.description: Export only CORE/SUPPORTING files to target directory, preserving structure. Ensure exported codebase is runnable (all transitive deps present).

tasks.title: Implement Soldier fast decision engine
tasks.description: Local real-time trading engine with P99 latency < 150ms, hot-failover support, no circular deps with Commander/Scholar.

tasks.title: Implement Commander slow strategy engine
tasks.description: Cloud-based strategy analyzer producing market regime, risk assessment, and recommendations. No circular deps.

tasks.title: Implement Scholar deep research engine
tasks.description: Factor research system generating reports with factor_score, insight, and risk_metrics. No circular deps.
